page.title: 08An average Kingswood House
page.content:
Here is an{estate agent's write-up on an average sized home in the Kingswood residential area of {Kingswood Warren.}It gives some idea of the quality of{housing}in the area:
Â£195,000 - Superb character detached residence set in large,secluded grounds in one of Kingswood's finest roads. The excellent{accommodation}includes cloakroom, 23'x15'5'' lounge/dining room, further reception room, luxury kitchen/breakfast room, utility room, master bedroom with en suite bathroom and sauna, balcony, 3 further bedrooms, bathroom, separate w.c., double garage, gas fired central heating, 2/3 acre lawned gardens backing onto Chiphouse Wood.
